Search for: Cafteria & Hostel NSRIT > Campus Life > Facilities > Cafteria & Hostel Computer Center Library Seminar Hall Transport Cafteria & Hostel Sports Recording Studio Talent Incubation Center Design Space Makers Space Other Facilities Cafteria & Hostel South Indian vegetarian and non-vegetarian food, hygienically prepared by trained chefs is served every day to suit all. The Menu is designed taking into consideration the nutritional and calorific requirements of the student. High emphasis is placed on Quality and Quantity. Separate dining facilities are provided for men and women.

The following facilities are also available for the benefit of the students and the staff STD Public call office. FAX Photocopying facility Hostel Facility The Institute has on-campus Hostel facility, provided with all the amenities to ensure utmost comfort and convenience to the inmates. For the continuation of education, learning and practice, the hostels are provided with Internet facility round the clock and also provided drinking water facilities through an exclusive RO plant. ×
